resources.string: Guess it is a word guessing game which can be played by minimum two players where player one will hold the phone without facing phone screen then player two will start game and player one has to guess word with help of player two without facing screen and talking.
1. Player one will hold phone above his or her head.
2. Player two will start game and try to express the word without speaking to player one.
3. Player one will guess the word if got it correct so player two will tap on next button or if player one want to skip the word so player two has to tap skip button.
4. On guessing correct word 10 points will be added and on guessing wrong word 10 points will be subtract to player one.
5. The time is one minute so any player who will guess max word correct will won the game.
6. If any player quits from game will lose.
About app icon for game introduction and rules.
app about icon for game rules
